amendment.description: To modify the provision governing the disposition of amounts paid to the Secretary for the conveyance of certain United States Fish and Wildlife Service land to the city of Yuma.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5226 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5226 proposed by Senator DeWine for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S11538; text: CR S11538) To modify the provision governing the disposition of amounts paid to the Secretary for the conveyance of certain United States Fish and Wildlife Service land to the city of Yuma.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5226 proposed by Senator DeWine for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5226 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
